title: Jean McAllister
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052849/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052849/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Jean McAllister**

Calgary-based a designer and illustrator. Created the Bad Cabbage and Bad Cabbage Primal typefaces for the [Image Club](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052849/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Image%20Club) foundry in 1997.

Identifont profile:

[http://www.identifont.com/show?8YA](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809052849/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8YA "http://www.identifont.com/show?8YA")
author: Grant Hutchinson
